Description of incident: In March of 2017, Michigan-based McLaren Medical Group (MMG) learned its computer system had been accessed by an unauthorized party, leading to a health data breach, according to an MMG statement issued to HealthITSecurity.com.The accessed system stored scanned documents including information related to authorizations, orders, appointment scheduling, and similar data. The breach occurred at MMG’s Mid-Michigan Physicians P.C. practice.Scanned documents may have included patient information such as patient names, dates of birth, addresses, phone numbers, medical record numbers, diagnoses, and Social Security numbers.
